    Technology & Design

    Kitchen and laundry appliances designed to make your life easier

    From removing the guesswork in laundry to preventing food fails in the kitchen, we’ve created trusted appliances to suit your ever-changing needs for over a century. Shop Hotpoint's range of kitchen and laundry appliances loaded with new technologies, durability and energy efficient products designed to stand the test of time.

    Total NoFrost technology for optimum efficiency

    Ice build-up can impact your fridge freezer’s performance, which is why we’ve developed Total NoFrost: an intelligent ventilation system that independently controls the airflow and humidity in both the fridge and freezer. This constant flow of air prevents ice build-up while taking care of your fresh and frozen food, by stabilising temperature fluctuations caused by opening and closing the door. Rest assured you’ll never need to worry about defrosting ever, saving you time, effort and money.

    Evenly cooked food, every time

    Our powerful Multiflow technology evenly distributes heat around your whole oven, so no matter what shelf you use, you’ll benefit from a consistently precise temperature throughout.
    This means no more hot or cold spots, raw middles or burnt edges, just delicious results every time.
